user.name: William Chen
user.bio: Full-Stack developer with 3+ years of experience. Specialising into ML/AI via a Masters at UoM. Not only will I build your ML model, but also the app around it.

node.name: azul-vibe
node.description: Azul made in Typescript. Vibe coded in an afternoon using Copilot. https://chillingo117.github.io/azul-vibe/

node.name: azul-bot
node.description: A C# client + lambda that works with azul-vibe. Runs an MCTS based reinforced learning model that plays Azul

node.name: WorldBank_Data
node.description: Contains R functions that access, process, and compare data from the WorldBank API as per their Indicators section https://datahelpdesk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/articles/898599-indicator-api-queries.

node.name: GDELT
node.description: GDELT Project. Uses PySpark for distributed processing with a KMeans classifier. Attempts to cluster countries based on their view of other countries. Fundamentally flawed approach to sentiment analysis.
